ref.description: Reference tables used for lookup values and categorization specific to BPKP (Badan Pengawasan Keuangan dan Pembangunan) of the Republic of Indonesia.

regions.description: Contains geographical regions for organizing administrative areas within Indonesia and other countries as required by BPKP.

region_name.description: Name of the region, typically corresponding to Indonesian regions or international zones.

countries.description: Contains information about countries, primarily used for BPKP’s administrative and operational regions.

id.description: Unique identifier for each country.

name.description: Country name, including the Republic of Indonesia and others for international coordination.

region.description: Reference to the geographical region this country belongs to.

created_on.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated.

code.description: ISO country code, including the 'ID' code for Indonesia.

provinces.description: Contains information about provinces within the Republic of Indonesia under BPKP’s jurisdiction.

id.description: Unique identifier for each province.

country.description: Reference to the country this province belongs to.

code.description: Province code as recognized by Indonesian administrative standards.

name.description: Name of the province within Indonesia.

cities.description: Contains information about cities and municipalities within Indonesian provinces for BPKP administration.

id.description: Unique identifier for each city or municipality.

province.description: Reference to the province where the city is located.

code.description: City code used for administrative purposes in Indonesia.

type.description: Type of city (e.g., 1: Kota, 2: Kabupaten, as classified under BPKP).

name.description: Name of the city or municipality.

ranks.description: Contains information about employee ranks within BPKP's organizational structure.

id.description: Unique identifier for each rank.

code.description: Unique code representing the rank level.

name.description: Name of the rank within the BPKP structure.

min_salary.description: Minimum salary associated with this rank in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR).

max_salary.description: Maximum salary associated with this rank in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR).

echelons.description: Contains information about echelons representing organizational levels in BPKP.

id.description: Unique identifier for each echelon.

name.description: Name of the echelon level (e.g., 'Eselon I', 'Eselon II').

min_rank.description: Reference to the minimum rank required for this echelon.

max_rank.description: Reference to the maximum rank allowed for this echelon.

min_salary.description: Minimum salary associated with this echelon in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR).

max_salary.description: Maximum salary associated with this echelon in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR).

created_on.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated.

code.description: Unique code representing the echelon level.

offices.description: Contains information about BPKP offices and their administrative locations throughout Indonesia.

id.description: Unique identifier for each BPKP office.

name.description: Name of the BPKP office or regional representative.

address.description: Physical address of the BPKP office.

postal_code.description: Postal code associated with the BPKP office location.

city.description: Reference to the city where the BPKP office is located.

province.description: Reference to the province where the BPKP office is located.

country.description: Reference to the country where the BPKP office is located, typically Indonesia.

kpi_categories.description: Contains categories for Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) used to evaluate BPKP employee performance.

id.description: Unique identifier for each KPI category.

name.description: Name of the KPI category (e.g., Audit Performance, Compliance Rate).

description.description: Detailed description of the KPI category.

unit.description: Measurement unit for the KPI (e.g., percentage, reports).

created_on.description: Timestamp when the KPI category was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the KPI category was last updated.

regulation_categories.description: Categorizes different regulations within BPKP's governance framework.

id.description: Unique identifier for each regulation category.

name.description: Name of the regulation category (e.g., Financial, Operational).

created_on.description: Timestamp when the regulation category was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the regulation category was last updated.

is_active.description: Status of the category (1: Active, 0: Inactive).

leave_types.description: Defines types of employee leave policies within BPKP (e.g., annual leave, sick leave).

id.description: Unique identifier for each leave type.

name.description: Name of the leave type (e.g., Annual Leave, Medical Leave).

max_days.description: Maximum allowable days for this leave type per cycle.

cycle.description: The cycle period for leave (e.g., yearly, monthly).

regulations.description: Contains records of official BPKP regulations and policies, including their status and document storage information.

id.description: Unique identifier for each regulation.

category.description: Reference to the category that classifies this regulation.

name.description: Title or official name of the regulation.

description.description: Detailed description or summary of the regulation.

created_on.description: Timestamp when the regulation record was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the regulation record was last updated.

status.description: Status of the regulation (1: valid, 2: invalid).

file_path.description: Path to the regulation document stored on the system.

text.description: Full text content of the regulation, if applicable.

hr.description: Human resources-related tables specific to managing BPKP employees, their organizational structure, attendance, leaves, and performance records.

employees.description: Contains detailed information about BPKP employees, including personal data, job details, and organizational structure.

id.description: Unique identifier for each employee.

id_number.description: Employee's unique identification number (NIP or equivalent for BPKP).

birth_place.description: City or region where the employee was born.

email.description: Official email address of the employee.

phone_number.description: Contact phone number for the employee.

tax_number.description: Taxpayer Identification Number (NPWP) for the employee.

hire_date.description: The date when the employee joined BPKP.

resignation_date.description: Date when the employee left BPKP (if applicable).

rank.description: Reference to the employee's official rank.

job.description: Reference to the employee's job title and responsibilities.

unit.description: Reference to the organizational unit where the employee is assigned.

manager.description: Reference to the employee's direct supervisor or manager.

salary.description: The employee's monthly salary in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR).

created_on.description: Timestamp when the employee record was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the employee record was last updated.

jobs.description: Defines job titles, their corresponding echelon levels, and rank requirements within BPKP.

id.description: Unique identifier for each job title.

title.description: Job title or official position name (e.g., Auditor, Senior Analyst).

echelon.description: Reference to the echelon level required for the job.

rank.description: Reference to the rank required for this job.

min_salary.description: Minimum salary for the job position in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR).

max_salary.description: Maximum salary for the job position in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR).

created_on.description: Timestamp when the job record was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the job record was last updated.

units.description: Describes BPKP's organizational structure by defining units, their hierarchy, and associated office locations.

id.description: Unique identifier for each organizational unit.

name.description: Name of the organizational unit (e.g., Directorate of Audit, IT Department).

echelon.description: Reference to the echelon level this unit falls under.

office.description: Reference to the physical office where the unit is located.

managing_unit.description: Reference to the parent or managing unit (for hierarchical structure).

head.description: Reference to the employee who leads the unit.

created_on.description: Timestamp when the unit record was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the unit record was last updated.

attendance.description: Records the attendance of BPKP employees, including check-in, check-out, and work status.

id.description: Unique identifier for each attendance record.

employee.description: Reference to the employee who the record belongs to.

check_in.description: Time when the employee checked in.

check_out.description: Time when the employee checked out.

status.description: Attendance status (0: absent, 1: present, 2: late, 3: leave, 4: remote, 5: business trip).

work_hours.description: Automatically calculated work duration for the day.

remarks.description: Additional remarks or comments regarding the attendance.

created_on.description: Timestamp when the attendance record was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the attendance record was last updated.

leave_type.description: Reference to the type of leave, if applicable.

leaves.description: Records employee leave requests and their approval status.

id.description: Unique identifier for each leave record.

employee.description: Reference to the employee requesting leave.

leave_type.description: Reference to the type of leave.

total_days.description: Total number of leave days requested.

approved_by.description: Reference to the employee who approved the leave.

created_on.description: Timestamp when the leave request was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the leave request was last updated.

leave_entitlements.description: Tracks leave balances and entitlements for BPKP employees.

id.description: Unique identifier for each leave entitlement.

year.description: The year for which the entitlement is valid.

employee.description: Reference to the employee receiving the entitlement.

entitlement.description: Total number of leave days entitled.

used.description: Number of leave days already used.

valid_fr.description: Start date of the entitlement validity.

valid_thru.description: End date of the entitlement validity.

status.description: Entitlement status (1: Active, 2: Pending, 3: Expired, 4: Depleted, 5: Exceeded).

created_on.description: Timestamp when the entitlement was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the entitlement was last updated.

kpi.description: Records and monitors employee performance using Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).

id.description: Unique identifier for each KPI record.

employee.description: Reference to the employee whose performance is being tracked.

target_value.description: The target value set for the KPI.

achieved_value.description: The value achieved by the employee.

performance.generated: CASE WHEN achieved_value >= target_value THEN 100.00 ELSE (achieved_value / target_value) * 100 END

dependents.description: Records information about employees' dependents (e.g., spouse, children) within BPKP.

id.description: Unique identifier for each dependent.

relationship.description: The relationship between the dependent and the employee (e.g., spouse, child).

employee.description: Reference to the employee to whom the dependent belongs.

created_on.description: Timestamp when the dependent record was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the dependent record was last updated.

sp.description: Records disciplinary actions (Surat Peringatan) issued to employees within BPKP.

id.description: Unique identifier for each disciplinary record.

sp_type.description: Type of disciplinary action (e.g., 1: Verbal Warning, 2: Written Warning).

employee.description: Reference to the employee receiving the disciplinary action.

valid_fr.description: Start date of the disciplinary action validity.

valid_thru.description: End date of the disciplinary action validity.

file.description: Path to the stored document of the disciplinary letter.

description.description: Details or explanation about the disciplinary action.

created_on.description: Timestamp when the disciplinary action was created.

updated_on.description: Timestamp when the disciplinary action was last updated.

v_employee_leave_details.description: Provides details about employee leaves, including entitlement and usage.

id.description: Employee ID.

year.description: Year for which the entitlement is valid.

start_date.description: Start date of the leave entitlement.

end_date.description: End date of the leave entitlement.

remaining.description: Leave days remaining for the employee.

description.description: Additional details or notes about the leave.

v_today_attendance.description: Summarizes the attendance of all employees for the current day.

status.description: Attendance status (e.g., 0: Absent, 1: Present, 2: Late, etc.).

percentage.description: Percentage of employees in this attendance category.

count.description: Total number of employees in this attendance category.

total_employee.description: Total number of employees being tracked.

v_employee_late_counter.description: Tracks how many times each employee was late, aggregated by month and year.

unit.description: Reference to the employee's organizational unit.

late_count.description: Number of times the employee was late.

v_employee_leaves_remaining.description: Displays remaining leave balances for each employee across different leave types.

id.description: Employee ID.

v_employee_dependents.description: Displays detailed information about employees and their dependents within BPKP.

relationship.description: Relationship of the dependent to the employee (e.g., spouse, child).

dependent_created_on.description: Timestamp when the dependent record was created.

birth_place.description: Place where the employee was born.

hire_date.description: Date when the employee joined BPKP.

resignation_date.description: Date when the employee left BPKP (if applicable).

salary.description: Employee's monthly salary in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR).

employee_created_on.description: Timestamp when the employee record was created.

manager_first_name.description: First name of the employee's manager.

manager_last_name.description: Last name of the employee's manager.

rank_min_salary.description: Minimum salary associated with the rank.

rank_max_salary.description: Maximum salary associated with the rank.

echelon_name.description: Name of the echelon level the employee belongs to.

echelon_min_salary.description: Minimum salary associated with the echelon.

echelon_max_salary.description: Maximum salary associated with the echelon.

unit_name.description: Name of the organizational unit where the employee works.

office_name.description: Name of the BPKP office where the employee is located.

office_address.description: Physical address of the BPKP office.

postal_code.description: Postal code of the BPKP office.

city_name.description: Name of the city where the BPKP office is located.

province_name.description: Name of the province where the BPKP office is located.

country_name.description: Name of the country where the BPKP office is located (typically Indonesia).

v_employee_profiles.description: Provides a comprehensive profile of BPKP employees, including job information, organizational structure, and location.

birth_place.description: Place where the employee was born.

hire_date.description: Date when the employee joined BPKP.

salary.description: Employee's monthly salary in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR).

unit_name.description: Name of the organizational unit where the employee works.

office_name.description: Name of the BPKP office where the employee is located.

city_name.description: City of the employee's office location.
